title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Move gingerly and gently about your day, as if youre recovering from a long rest. Perhaps youre more sensitive than you realize and are jarred by the stark contrast to the hard-edged world around you. The watery Pisces Moon encourages you to leave plenty of time to find your flow, including claiming space to just chill when you can. Tell those who try to prod you to act on their behalf to back off and give you room to breathe. Stay easygoing, and youll ease into where you need to be. Forcing yourself into action is only helpful once you generate enough internal motivation. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
